Package libai.common

Interface Summary
Function Interface for real fuctions F(x): R -> R.
Kernel  
Plotter  
ProgressDisplay  
 

Class Summary
GaussianKernel Implements a Gaussian kernel.
HyperbolicTangent Hyperbolic Tangent.
Identity Identity function f(x) = x; The first derivate of I(x), I'(x) = 1.
LinearKernel Implements a linear kernel based on the dot product.
Matrix Matrix implementation.
Pair<V extends Comparable,K extends Comparable> Pair class allows to keep two elements of possibly different types in the same structure and can be used for keep pairs key-value.
PolynomialKernel  
Sigmoid Sigmoid function: f(x) = 1/(1+e^-x) The first derivate of the sigmoid function S(x) S'(x) = S(x)*(1-S(x))
SigmoidalKernel  
Sign Signum function F(x) = 0 if x < 0 or 1 if x >= 1 This function is not derivable.
SymmetricSign Symmetric Signum function F(x) = -1 if x < 0 or 1 if x >= 1 This function is not derivable.
